name: Kommatarbullet
description:
Well here is an Bullethell / Shoter type of game I made for an School Project in 6 hours...

The Goal of this small Game is to survive for as long as you can the ever growing waves of Enemies...You can also shoot different bullets , which all have their own unique ability...but be aware that some Enemies will shoot back...

Good Luck and also maybe post your Scores / Times in the Comments below if you want to!
